overview: Bento de Souza, a devotee of São João, is not reciprocated by his wife, Inocência, who cheats on him with Trindade, a rogue who lives off Bento himself. That year, disgusted by the rumors about him, Bento decided to expel Trindade from the house.

production_companies.name: NTM Produtora e Distribuidora de Filmes

title: Os Três Justiceiros
